refnamediv.refpurpose: Write a fsig to a PVOCEX file.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This opcode writes a fsig to a PVOCEX file (which in turn can be read by pvsfread or other programs that support PVOCEX file input).

refsect1.title: Initialisation
refsect1.para: fsig -- fsig input data. ifile -- filename (a string in double-quotes) .

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the pvsfwrite opcode. It uses the file pvsfwrite.csd. This example uses realtime audio input.
Example of the pvsfwrite opcode
